channel.title: Apocalypse World: Outlands (Fridays in May)
channel.description:
*Apocalypse World: Outlands*
Welcome to the game that started PbtA! These are the Outlands, a wuxia-inspired post-apocalypse in the multicultural vein of Firefly and Into the Badlands. Come for volatile emotions and to help build a world that might just be worth saving. No previous knowledge of Apocalypse World is needed and the first session is where we will get the nuts and bolts of this world flowing.
Fridays at 7:30 pm CDT in May
Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LaayAaV1tacckZAEWab Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LaayQlv4E8Q8z3Jyofh Session 3: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LaaydKgs6KHzd1D6zw5 Session 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LaayrkCaKY4UdOJkEf5 Session 5: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Laaz8v9RpzmvapBFOfE
